attributes.action: Amend section 21 of the Housing Act 1988 to allow for the speedy eviction of disruptive tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With an increase in the number of properties being bought to let an new environmental blight is begining to emerge, the disruptive tenant. The quality of life of numerous people is being destroyed by this pest, be it due to noise, litter, threatening and unsociable behaviour. The road to removing such a problem is long and arduous and not for the faint hearted. A change in the law is essential to allow for the speedy removal of such tenants and allow communities the peace and quiet that they are entitled to deserve.
